DOC.brief_summary: The Beijing Hospital Atherosclerosis Study ( BHAS ) prospective , single-center , observational cohort study perform Beijing Hospital Beijing , China . Subjects enrol study consecutive patient undergo coronary angiography hospital . Blood sample take immediately angiographic procedure . Clinical angiographic characteristic record . All patient routine follow-up 6 month 1 year postprocedure , yearly thereafter . Follow-up include mortality , myocardial infarction ( MI ) , stroke , rehospitalization , coronary revascularization procedure , life style , medication use . The primary end point study major adverse cardiovascular event ( MACE ) , define death cause , nonfatal myocardial infarction , nonfatal stroke revascularization . This study review approve Ethics Committee Beijing Hospital . All enrolled individual receive write notice intend use blood sample provide write consent .
